docs.title: AWS S3 integration
docs.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) is storage for the internet. You can use Amazon S3 to store and retrieve any amount of data at any time, from anywhere on the web.

docs.description: Amazon Simple Email Service enables you to send and receive email using a reliable and scalable email platform. Set up your custom Amazon simple email service account.

docs.title: Facebook integration guide
docs.description: Erxes app can be integrated with facebook developer API and that means we can receive our Facebook pages' inbox messages and posts directly to our erxes app's inbox. With the help of Facebook developer API we have many more possibilities, like receiving notifications about page comment, page post feed etc. There is an active development process going on this subject.

docs.title: Gmail integration guide
docs.description: Read and send messages, manage drafts and attachments, search threads and messages, work with labels, setup push notifications, and manage Gmail settings.

docs.title: Google Cloud Storage
docs.description: Cloud Storage provides worldwide, highly durable object storage that scales to exabytes of data. You can access data instantly from any storage class, integrate storage into your applications with a single unified API, and easily optimize price and performance.

metadata.title: Erxes v0.13.0 release information
metadata.description: Welcome to the March 2020 release of Erxes. The number of updates and new features are highlighted in this version. Therefore, the breaking change has done in this release. Major features of the 0.13.0 series, compared to release 0.12.0\.

prevItem.title: Install erxes with a 1-Click App on Heroku

metadata.title: Erxes v0.12.0 release information
metadata.description: Erxes 0.12.0 release contains the number of new features, resolved issues and improvements. Therefore, the breaking changes has done in this release. Major features of the 0.12.0 series, compared to release 0.11.2\.

metadata.title: Monetization While Balancing Open and Closed Source Projects with Sanket Sahu
metadata.description: Today, erxes had the opportunity to chat with Sanket Sahu about his involvement in various open and closed source projects. His project NativeBase is currently used by over 37,000 projects. Sanket uses a very unique approach to monetization and balancing multiple projects at once. So let‚Äôs jump into the interview to learn more!

nextItem.title: Increasing Growth by Building a Community with Norbert Sendetzky

metadata.title: Increasing Growth by Building a Community with Norbert Sendetzky
metadata.description: At erxes, we‚Äôre dedicated to supporting open source projects grow. We do this in a couple of different ways. First, we help open source projects grow through the use of our own own open source marketing platform. Secondly, we work hard to educate open source project founders and contributors on a wide range of topics relating to marketing open source projects.

prevItem.title: Monetization While Balancing Open and Closed Source Projects with Sanket Sahu

nextItem.title: Debunking the Myth of a Single Creator with Justin Cappos

metadata.title: Debunking the Myth of a Single Creator with Justin Cappos
metadata.description: Today, erxes had the opportunity to chat with Justin Cappos, professor in the Computer Science and Engineering department at New York University. We talked about his involvement in various open source projects, including TUF, a project aimed at helping developers maintain the security of their software update systems.

prevItem.title: Increasing Growth by Building a Community with Norbert Sendetzky

nextItem.title: All Things Open Source and Preparing for a Project Launch with Sandoche Adittane

metadata.title: All Things Open Source and Preparing for a Project Launch with Sandoche Adittane
metadata.description: We had the opportunity to chat with Sandoche Adittane about his experiences building and promoting both open and closed source projects online. He has a lot of projects under his belt. You may know him as the creator of darkmode.js or most recently, as the maker of Kanbanote, Kanban boards for Evernote or git.news, a list of trending GitHub repos.

prevItem.title: Debunking the Myth of a Single Creator with Justin Cappos
